META_DEFAULT_TITLE: Citizen OS - e-lēmumu pieņemšanas platforma kopienām.
META_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Citizen OS ļauj piedalīties diskusijās un balsot grupās tad, kad tikties visiem kopā vienā laikā neizdodas.
META_DEFAULT_KEYWORDS: e-lēmumu pieņemšana, e-pārvalde, e-demokrātija, demokrātija, tiešā demokrātija, plūstošā demokrātija
TXT_REPORT_TYPES_SPAM: Satur spamu vai nav saistīts ar tematu
HELP_CENTER_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Ikreiz, kad nezināt, kā rīkoties tālāk, vienkārši atveriet Palīdzības centru, lai atrastu atbildes uz saviem jautājumiem. Palīdzības centram vienmēr var piekļūt, atverot burbuli apakšējā labajā stūrī.

HELP_WIDGET.TITLE: Esam šeit, lai palīdzētu!
HELP_WIDGET.DESCRIPTION: Ir jautājumi vai komentāri? Uzrakstiet mums ziņojumu zemāk.

ACCESSIBILITY.OPT_CONTRAST_DEFAULT_DESC: Citizen OS in its default colour scheme
ACCESSIBILITY.OPT_CONTRAST_HIGH_DESC: Citizen OS in a high contrast colour scheme

ARGUMENT_REPORT.HEADING: Report participant to admin
ARGUMENT_REPORT.PLACEHOLDER_REPORT_TEXT: Explain, why you found this argument inappropriate...

ARGUMENT_REPORT_MODERATE.HEADING: Moderate argument
ARGUMENT_REPORT_MODERATE.ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to hide this argument? You cannot undo this action.

ARGUMENT_WHY.HEADING: Why is this content hidden?
ARGUMENT_WHY.MESSAGE_MAIN: The admin chose to hide this content. You can review the reason below.

CREATE.DESC_DISCUSSION: Choose this if you want to encourage a discussion before potentially moving to ideation, voting and/or follow-up.
CREATE.DESC_IDEATION: Choose this if you want to gather ideas before potentially moving to voting and/or follow-up. No pro/con discussion available.
CREATE.DESC_VOTE: Choose this if you want to collect people’s votes before potentially moving to follow-up. No pro/con discussion or ideation available.
CREATE.DESC_GROUP: Create a group to which you can invite people belonging to the same organisation, club, location, etc.

DUPLICATE_TOPIC.HEADING: Duplicate topic
DUPLICATE_TOPIC.MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to duplicate the topic? This will create a new private topic in draft.
DUPLICATE_TOPIC.WILL_BE_DUPLICATED_1: Topic content as it is right now (including images, footnotes, comments, mini-votes)
DUPLICATE_TOPIC.HEADING_WILL_NOT_BE_DUPLICATED: This content will not be duplicated

GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.HEADING: Find and add topics to the group
GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.DESC: When you add a topic to the group, all members of that group will have access to the topic.
GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.NO_TOPICS_HEADING: You haven’t added any topics yet
GROUP_ADD_TOPICS.NO_TOPICS_DESC: Add topics to your group to incentivise members to engage with them. This is not mandatory and you can always add topics later.

GROUP_INVITE.HEADING: Invite members to the group
GROUP_INVITE.EMAIL_DESC: Invite people via their username or email address
GROUP_INVITE.NO_INVITES_DESC: Kickstart your group by inviting people. This is not mandatory and you can always invite them later.
GROUP_INVITE.INVALID_EMAILS_HEADER: Invalid email format. Please correct before sending invitation.
GROUP_INVITE.NAME: Name

GROUP_JOIN.HEADING: Join group
GROUP_JOIN.MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: This group has set rules of conduct. Please read and follow them so everyone has a great experience.

TOPIC_JOIN.HEADING: Join topic
TOPIC_JOIN.MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to join the topic? See the explanation below for what this means. You can always easily leave a topic if you want to.
TOPIC_JOIN.HEADING_WHAT_CAN_YOU_DO: What you can do once you join a topic
TOPIC_JOIN.ITEM_NOTIFICATIONS: Receive notifications of activity within the topic

GROUP_SHARE.GENERATE_QR_CODE_DESCRIPTION: Generate a QR code that people can scan to come straight to the topic. You can add the QR code to digital or physical comms, and display it wherever the right people will see it.
GROUP_SHARE.GENERATE_QR_CODE_PRINT: To save the QR code as a PDF, open it up and use the "print as PDF" functionality.

LOGIN_SMART_ID_FORM.LOGIN_SMARTID_TXT_CHECK_CONTROL_CODE: Make sure the control code matches with the one displayed on your phone, and enter Smart-ID PIN1.

ONBOARDING.DESCRIPTION: As this is your first time on the Citizen OS dashboard, we recommend you take the walkthrough tour so you can get to know the platform better.
ONBOARDING.TAKE_A_TOUR: The walkthrough only takes a couple of minutes.

REGISTER_FORM.HEADING: Register a free account
REGISTER_FORM.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: Create an account to get free unlimited access to the Citizen OS platform
REGISTER_FORM.HAVE_AN_ACCOUNT: Have an account? Log in now

REPORT_TOPIC.HEADING: Report topic
REPORT_TOPIC.PLACEHOLDER_REPORT_TEXT: Explain, why you found this argument inappropriate...

SEARCH.TITLE: Global search
SEARCH.DESC_START_SEARCH: You can search topics, groups, categories and tags.
SEARCH.TXT_OOPS_NO_RESULTS: Oops, we couldn’t find any results matching your search :(
SEARCH.TXT_MAYBE_TYPO: Maybe there's a typo in your search?

TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_1_DESC: You can always create a new topic, start gathering ideas, propose a new vote or create a new group.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC: The main menu serves as your main navigation through the platform. There are quick links to all your topics based on their current phase, ie. discussion, idea gathering, etc.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC2: You can also access different languages and support from here.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC: New activity within a topic you’re involved in will be indicated here. You can open and close the activity feed whenever you want.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC2: If there has been new activity since you last visited, the activity feed will be open by default.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC: Looking for a topic or a group? Search for it here.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC2: The search is aware of whether you are in a topic or not. If you’re not, it will search across the platform.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC3: If you’re in a topic, it will only search within that topic.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC: As you're not yet active in any topics, we’ve populated this space with popular public topics.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC2: Once you've participated in or created topics, they will show up here.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_6_DESC: Groups are a collective of people that have something in common. For example, members could be part of the same organisation or community. Or have similar interests or goals.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC: Your topic can have different phases.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_DISCUSSION: In this phase, the main idea is to hold a constructive discussion using pro and con arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_IDEATION: A topic can have an ideation phase, in which anyone can share their ideas on how to tackle the issue at hand.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_VOTE: When there’s a need for a clear representation of where participants lean, you can hold a vote.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: After a decision has been made, the follow-up phase offers a way to keep participants up-to-date with the next steps.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC: In each topic you can perform specific actions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_SEARCH: Find anything within the topic itself and quickly jump to that keyword.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_ACTIVITY_FEED: Check out what happened while you were away with the topic's activity feed.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_FAVOURITE: Add or remove this topic to or from your favourites.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_MORE: If you need to edit, invite a co-creator or close a topic, this is the place.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC: This houses all the relevant topic info you might need. Is it public or private? Who published it and when?
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC2: Here you can see the social media hashtag used. Clicking on it reveals the social media mentions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC3: Finally, categories define the topic more precisely.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_4_DESC: Here you can see how many participants are in this topic. You can also manage them from here and invite more people.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_5_DESC: As we mentioned before, a topic can consist of several phases. This is where you can add another phase.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC: Topic text is the basis for the discussion and/or voting. The main information will be shared here.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC2: By default, we will keep this collapsed, but you can expand it at any time to read the entire text.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC: The main discussion will take place here. Anyone can post a pro or con argument, or provide some additional information.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC2: Other participants can agree or disagree with arguments, and post replies or reactions.

TOPIC_INVITE.HEADING: @:COMPONENTS.GROUP_INVITE.HEADING
TOPIC_INVITE.NO_INVITES_DESC: Kickstart your group by inviting people. This is not mandatory and you can always invite them later.
TOPIC_INVITE.NAME: @:COMPONENTS.GROUP_INVITE.NAME

TOPIC_VOTE_CAST.INFO_YOU_WILL_SEE_WHO_VOTED: You will see what they voted on when the voting has ended.

TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to start the topic vote?
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_1: You can no longer (co-)edit your topic text
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_2: You can still invite and share with participants
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_3: Participants can still continue to have a discussion
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_INFO: From here you can move the topic into follow-up.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.VOTE_QUESTION_HEADING: Please add a specific question for the participants to vote on.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_REGULAR_DESC: Participants can choose from a simple yes, no or neutral
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_MULTIPLE_DESC: Participants can choose from custom options you set
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_CAN_ADD_EXTRA_OPTIONS: You can also add neutral and veto options.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_AUTH_HARD_ID_DESC: The participant has to log in to cast their vote
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_DELEGATION_DESC: Allow users to pass on their voting right.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_CHOOSE_VOTING_END_DESC: You can choose either a deadline or vote amount, or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end voting.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_DEADLINE_DESC: When the set date is reached, the vote is closed.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DEADLINE_LBL_OPTION_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_DE: You can set an automatic reminder email for participants, to be sent out before the vote closes
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_DESC: When every participant in the topic has voted, the vote system closes.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_MULTIPLE: This is a multiple selection vote. The maximum amount of options you can choose: {{maxOptions}}.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_REGULAR: This is a single selection vote

TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to start the topic follow-up?
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_1: You can no longer (co-)edit your document
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_2: You can still invite and share with participants
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_3: You can set milestones, checklists and deadline for the topic’s next steps
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_INFO: This is the last stage of a topic.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_REGULAR_DESC: Participants can choose from a simple yes, no or neutral
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_MULTIPLE_DESC: Participants can choose from custom options you set
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_CAN_ADD_EXTRA_OPTIONS: You can also add neutral and veto options.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_AUTH_HARD_ID_DESC: The participant has to log in to cast their vote
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_DELEGATION_DESC: Allow users to pass on their voting right.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_CHOOSE_VOTING_END_DESC: You can choose either deadline or vote amount or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end voting.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_DEADLINE_DESC: When the set date is reached, the vote is closed.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DEADLINE_LBL_OPTION_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_DE: You can set an automatic reminder email for participants, to be sent out before the vote closes
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_DESC: When every participant in the topic has voted, the vote system closes.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_MULTIPLE: This is a multiple selection vote. The maximum amount of options you can choose: {{maxOptions}}.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_REGULAR: This is a single selection vote

MODALS.LANGUAGES_MODAL_HELP_US_TRANSLATE: Your language missing? Help us translate!
MODALS.WIDGETS_HOW_DOES_IT_WORK_TEXT: Jūs varat piedalīties diskusijā, iesniedzot savus argumentus
MODALS.PRIVACY_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: Mēs ieviesām izmaiņas mūsu Lietošanas noteikumos un Privātuma politikā. Lūdzu, iepazīstieties ar šīm izmaiņām un piekrītiet vai nepiekrītiet tām. Nepiekrītot mūsu pakalpojuma Lietošanas noteikumiem, jūs vairs nevarēsiet izmantot mūsu platformu, jūsu konta darbība tiks pārtraukta un jūs atgriezīsieties sākumlapā.
MODALS.USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Vai tiešām vēlaties dzēst savu kontu?
MODALS.USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_UNDO: Lūdzu, atcerieties, ka šo darbību nav iespējams atcelt.
MODALS.USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_KEEP_DATA_ANONYM: Visi lietotāju izveidotie dati tiks anonimizēti un nebūs atgūstami
MODALS.DUPLICATE_TOPIC_CONFIRM_HEADING: Vai tiešām vēlaties dublēt šo tematu?
MODALS.DUPLICATE_TOPIC_CONFIRM_HEADING_DESCRIPT: Šī darbība izveidos jaunu privāto tematu ar statusu "procesā"
MODALS.DUPLICATE_TOPIC_CONFIRM_TXT_COPY_TOPIC_C: topic content as it is right now (including images, footnotes, comments)
MODALS.ADD_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Lūdzu, norādiet e-pasta adresi, lai saņemtu uzaicinājumus un citus saistošos paziņojumus.
MODALS.ADD_EMAIL_TXT_VERIFY: Svarīgi: īsi pēc pierakstīšanās saņemsiet e-pasta ziņojumu jūsu e-pasta adreses verifikācijai. Neaizmirstiet veikt verifikāciju, lai pabeigtu reģistrāciju!
MODALS.ADD_EID_HEADING: Savienot jūsu kontu ar jūsu eID?
MODALS.ADD_EID_DESCRIPTION: Vai zinājāt, ka varat sinhronizēt savu kontu ar savu eID? Noklikšķiniet uz pogas zemāk, lai veiktu šo darbību, vai turpiniet bez sinhronizācijas (jūs varat to izdarīt vēlāk konta iestatījumos).
MODALS.USER_CONNECTION_REMOVE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_Y: Vai tiešām vēlaties noņemt savienojumu ar {{connection}}?
MODALS.TOPIC_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_TITLE_DESCRI: Iestatījumi attiecas tikai uz šo tēmu: {{topicTitle}}
MODALS.TOPIC_NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_LBL_TOPIC_UP: Topic updates (content, status, categories, moderation, etc.)
MODALS.REMOVE_TOPIC_NOTIFICATIONS_CONFIRM_ARE_Y: Vai tiešām vēlaties izslēgt šīs tēmas paziņojumus?
MODALS.REMOVE_TOPIC_NOTIFICATIONS_CONFIRM_YES: Yes, turn off notifications for this topic
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_HEADING: Are you sure you want to join this public group?
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to join this public group?
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_DESC: By joining this group you agree to the following:
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT1: Your username is included in the group members list, publicly visible to all group members
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT2: You, like other members, will only have reading rights.
MODALS.GROUP_JOIN_CONFIRM_TXT_POINT3: Group activity is displayed under the "My activity" feed
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_HEADING: We'd love to know you better
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_DESC: Hi there! We're really excited to get to know our users, and find out what you use our platform for. Happy to share? It will help us evaluate our impact and make our platform better suit your needs.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_QUESTION_1: What do you use Citizen OS for?
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_QUESTION_2: Could we contact you to find out more? (We'll keep it brief, we promise).
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_LBL_CHECKBOX: Yes, I am happy to be contacted by a representative of Citizen OS.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_CAREFULL: P.S! Always be mindful of what data you share.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_GDPR: By submitting your response, Citizen OS will collect and process your personal data for the purposes of understanding user needs and contacting consenting users, in accordance with the relevant and applicable legislative acts related to the protection of personal data, including GDPR.
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_BE_VIEW_MORE_LEGAL: For more information, please read our Privacy Policy
MODALS.GIVE_FEEDBACK_TEXT_THANK_YOU: Thank you so much for sharing with us. If you agreed to chat more, we'll be in touch soon! For any queries or feedback in the future, please submit a Help Request or User Feedback via our Help Centre.

ACCOUNT.HEADING: Profile
ACCOUNT.LBL_SHOW_IN_SEARCH: Show my profile in search results
ACCOUNT.LBL_SHOW_IN_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Display my name and email in invite search results so that other people can easily invite me to groups and topics
ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION_MANAGE_UPDATES: Engagement updates and analytics will be sent via email every defined period

DASHBOARD.HEADER_WELCOME: Welcome back to your dashboard {{user.name}}
DASHBOARD.HAVENT_ENGAGED_TOPICS_HEADING: You haven’t engaged in any topics yet
DASHBOARD.HAVENT_ENGAGED_TOPICS_DESCRIPTION: Engage in topics by joining in discussions and voting. Or create your own topics and invite participants so they can share their thoughts.
DASHBOARD.HELP_US_HEADER: Help us build the best participation platform!
DASHBOARD.HELP_US_LNK_KEEP_PLATFORM_FREE: Help us keep the platform free
DASHBOARD.SUBSCRIBE_FORM_DESCRIPTION: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates and news related to our platform and our work.

HOME.STATS_DESCRIPTION: Make smarter, more impactful decisions based on respectful discussions on our free, open-source participation platform.
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_ITEM_1: Create and co-edit a topic text
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_ITEM_3: Participants can discuss using pro/con arguments
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_ITEM_4: Argument popularity can be measured via 'likes'
HOME.FEATURE_DISCUSSION_FOOTER_INFO: After the discussion you can move the topic into voting and/or follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_ITEM_1: Create and co-edit a topic text
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_ITEM_3: Participants can share ideas and comment on each other's
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_ITEM_4: Idea popularity can be measured via 'likes'
HOME.FEATURE_IDEATION_FOOTER_INFO: After gathering ideas you can move the topic into voting and/or follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_ITEM_1: Create and co-edit a topic text
HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_ITEM_3: Participants can vote on the topic
HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_ITEM_4: Several voting systems are available: multiple selection, custom, etc.
HOME.FEATURE_VOTING_FOOTER_INFO: After collecting votes you can move the topic into follow-up.
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_HEADING: Groups – harnessing the power of the people
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_1: Invite people into a group to give them easy access to relevant topics
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_2: Join a public or private group that deals with topics of your interest
HOME.FEATURE_GROUP_DESC_ITEM_3: Enjoy quicker sharing or unsharing of topics, a group space containing all topics shared to those users, and easier rights administration.
HOME.HEADING_WELCOME: Hi there, welcome to Citizen OS!
HOME.PUBLIC_GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: Have a sneak peek at some of the most recent public groups currently available on Citizen OS.
HOME.PUBLIC_TOPICS_DESCRIPTION: Have a sneak peek at some of the most recent public topics currently available on Citizen OS.
HOME.MISSION_BOX_DESC: To empower as many people as possible to participate in respectful, meaningful discussions. We aim to facilitate collective decisions on issues that directly affect people’s wellbeing.
HOME.HEADING_GET_STARTED: We can’t display results for that search. Maybe try another search or initiate the discussion
HOME.TXT_BEGINNERS_GUIDE: Sveicināti un laipni lūdzam Citizen OS! Lasiet šo tematu, lai uzzinātu, kā viss strādā.
HOME.TXT_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Keep It Clean Plan by Let's Do It! World.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_KEEP_IT_CLEAN_PLAN: Šeit atradīsiet visu dokumentāciju un informāciju par "Keep It Clean" plānu.
HOME.TXT_DESCRIPTION_HACKTIVIST_COMMUNITY: Pilsonisko haktīvistu kopiena ir vieta, kur satiekas cilvēki, kas atbalsta e-demokrātiju un kopīgu lēmumu pieņemšanu.
HOME.TXT_CITIZENOS_COMMUNITY: Diskusijas par e-demokrātiju ar Citizen OS komandu
HOME.TXT_CITIZENOS_COMMUNITY_DESCRIPTION: Pievienojieties mums diskusijās par platformas attīstību un e-demokrātiju.

GROUP_CREATE.HEADING: Create a group
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_INPUT_NAME_DESC: Use a name that’s understandable and logical.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_CHOOSE_IMAGE_DESC: Upload an image that represents your group well.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_LBL_DROP_IMAGE: Drop the image here or click the button
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_INPUT_CONTACT_EMAIL_DESC: This email will be visible to participants – and everyone if it’s a public group.
GROUP_CREATE.INFO_SETTINGS_RULES_OF_CONDUCT_DESC: Add rules of conduct, to avoid any bad experiences. E.g. use a certain language, or no hatespeech.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_DESC: Set whether your group is visible to anyone, or only by invitation.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_PRIVATE_DESC: Only people with invites can join
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_CATEGORY_SELECT_DESC: Choose up to 3 categories that fit your topic.
GROUP_CREATE.SETTINGS_LOCALITY_SELECT_DESC: You can assign a country and language to this group, to make it easier for local participants to find.
GROUP_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Creating a group is a great way to give people a sense of belonging to a community, and makes them more likely to engage.
GROUP_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations! Keep in mind you can always manage the group via the group actions menu.

MY.HEADING_NOT_PARTICIPATED: Jūs vēl nepiedalījāties temata apspriešanā. Pamēģiniet, tas tiešām ir forši!
MY.NO_RESULTS_FOUND_DESCRIPTION: We can’t display results for what you’ve searched for. Maybe try something else?

MY_TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_NO_PERMISSION_TO_DELETE_MEMBER: You don't have permission to delete a member
MY_TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_PERMISSION_VIA_GROUP: Permission was granted via group - you may remove member from the group or override permissions by selecting the appropriate value from the dropdown.

PARTNERS_CONSENT.HEADING: {{website}} would like to access following data from your account:
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_PROFILE: View and edit your Citizen OS profile - name, company, email, picture.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_TOPICS: View and edit your Citizen OS public topics and topics created via the {{website}} website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_VOTES: View and edit your Citizen OS votes in public topics and topics created via the {{website}} website.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_VIEW_GROUPS: Apskatīt un rediģēt jūsu Citizen OS grupas.
PARTNERS_CONSENT.TXT_POLICY: {{website}} will use this information in accordance with their respective Terms of Service and Privacy Policies.

PARTNERS_LOGIN.HEADING: {{website}} works together with Citizen OS to offer you a great experience. If you want to use the platform to its fullest, please log in or register to Citizen OS.

PASSWORD_FORGOT.PASSWORD_FORGOT_DESCRIPTION: No worries! We can send you a reset link so you can get a new password.

PUBLIC_GROUPS.TITLE: Public groups
PUBLIC_GROUPS.HEADING_GET_STARTED: There are no public groups yet

PUBLIC_GROUP.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: Seems there are no topics belonging to this group yet.

REGISTER.REGISTER_DESCRIPTION: Create an account to get free unlimited access to the Citizen OS platform

TOPIC_CREATE.HEADING: Create a topic
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_ADD_TO_GROUP_DESC: You can already add this topic to a group for which you have admin rights. You can also do this later.
TOPIC_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO: You can edit your topic text now or later (but not after voting has started).
TOPIC_CREATE.WRITE_TOGETHER_DESC: Collaborate on the topic text by inviting co-creators.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Creating a discussion topic allows the participants to use pro & con arguments, which can help you shape the next phases of the topic.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_IDEATION: Add ideation to start gathering ideas
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_VOTING: Add voting to start collecting votes
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_FOLLOW_UP: Add follow-up to keep participants up to date on any progress made.

TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_EDIT: Jūs ieslēdzāt rediģēšanas režīmu. Jūs varat pievienot vai rediģēt tekstu. Visas izmaiņas tiek saglabātas automātiski.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_VOTE: Par šo tematu ir sākta balsošana, rediģēšana vairs nav iespējama!
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW: Izskatās, ka jūsu balsojums beidzās ar neizšķirtu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_DRAW_DESCRIPTION: Sometimes having several winning options is a good thing, but there are times when you really just need one clear winner.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: It might be possible to solve this offline - for example, a co-located team could flip a coin between the two winning options. Also, if you had votes going to non-winning options, we suggest you run another vote between the two winning options only. This time, you could pre-determine a tie-breaker in case you have another draw: a coin flip, a default winning option (usually status quo wins in a draw), a person whose vote is decisive, etc.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_REPORTED: Ziņojums par šo tematu ir iesniegts.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_SUBJECT: Kā šis lēmums tiek ieviests praksē?
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote requires an ID-card or Mobiil-ID signature.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote needs to be signed with an ID-card or Mobiil-ID to be registered. You cannot vote without identifying yourself.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Thank you for your vote. You can still change your vote at any time before the voting closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: To download voting results, select a suitable format below. Our "human-readable" container comes with an additional spreadsheet file (.csv, comma-separated table) containing data for each individual vote, as required by Riigikogu and local governments. For systems that can't process such info (such as Äriregister) please select "machine-readable" file.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED_EXPIRED: Tagad balsis ir nodotas. Lūdzu, nosūtiet tematu īstenošanai, pēc tam atgrieziet šeit, lai lejupielādētu balsošanas rezultātus.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: Jāparaksta, izmantojot ID-Card, Mobiil-ID vai Smart-ID
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: Allow users to pass on their voting right.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: Kad ir izvēlēta eID balsošanas metode, deleģēšana nav atļauta.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP4_DESCRIPTION: You can choose either a deadline or vote amount, or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end voting.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_VOTE_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Define the end of the voting system based on the amount of votes counted. You can only choose one.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_MINIMUM_VOTES_DESCRIPTION: The amount of votes required for a successful closure.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_EXPLANATION: When every user in the topic has voted, the vote system closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_EXPLANATION: You can set an automatic reminder email for users a few days before the end of the vote
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_YOU_CAN_CHOOSE_OPTIONS: This is a multiple selection vote. You can choose max {{maxChoices}} options that align with your view.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_DESCRIPTION_CHOICE_RANGE: Define the max amount of choices a person can vote for. For example, you have 4 choices but you allow people to choose up to 2 out of them. You can only add as many as you have choices to choose from.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: Šo argumentu par neatbilstošu atzina lietotājs {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_READ_CODE_OF_CONDUCT: Lasiet mūsu uzvedības kodeksu, lai uzzinātu vairāk
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_REPLY_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: Šo atbildi par neatbilstošu atzina lietotājs {{usersFullName}}
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Izmantojiet šo opciju, ja piekrītat un vēlaties sniegt argumentu, kurā pausts atbalsts vai kas ir labvēlīgs tēmai.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_C: Izmantojiet šo opciju, ja nepiekrītat un vēlaties sniegt argumentu, kurā netiek pausts atbalsts vai kas nav labvēlīgs tēmai.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Izmantojiet šo opciju, ja vēlaties paust īsu apgalvojumu vai domu, uzdot jautājumu vai jaut ko precizēt saistībā ar tēmu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.PLACEHOLDER_EXPLAIN_YOUR_ARGUMENT: Paskaidrojiet un pierādīt savu apgalvojumu šeit...
TOPICS_TOPICID.BTN_ARGUMENT_POST_AS_POI: Pievienot informāciju vai kaut ko precizēt
TOPICS_TOPICID.LOG_IN_TO_PARTICIPATE: You need to log in to participate.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_METIONS_TXT_NO_HASHTAG_DEFINE: Sorry, we cannot show social mentions as there is no hashtag linked to this topic. Topic admins can add the hashtag to pull in social mentions.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_MENTIONS_NO_MENTIONS_FOUND: Sorry, no social mentions found on X for the hashtag
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_QR_CODE_FOOTER_SCAN_CODE: Pārejiet tieši uz tēmu {{topicTitle}}, noskenējot šo QA kodu!
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_HEADING: There is no voting system yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_BEFORE: By adding a voting system to your topic, you have a final opportunity to find out what participants think of it. You can set up different types of voting, depending on your needs.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_AFTER: After voting has finished, you can download the results files to take the decision forward.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_UP_HEADING: There is no follow-up system yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_BEFORE: Follow-up is the last phase of a topic. After a decision has been made, it's important to keep participants up to date with the next steps.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_AFTER: Describe, what will happen as a result of the made decisions, adding details of any progress or outcomes.

401.DESCRIPTION_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: If you've received an invite to the topic or group you're trying to access, you need to accept it first. Please check your activity feed or email.
401.HEADING_YOU_MAY_RECOVER: Here are two ways to resolve this:

ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ADD_USER_TOPIC_ACTIVITYGRO: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi uzaicināja lietotājus piedalīties tematā {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ACCEPT_INVITE_TOPIC_ACTIVI: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi pieņēma uzaicinājumu uz tematu {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER: Lietotājs {{userName}} veica izmaiņas lietotāja {{userName2}} piekļuves līmenim tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER_ACT: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi mainīja lietotāja piekļuves līmeni tematam {{topicTitle}}.
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER_USE: Lietotājs {{userName}} mainīja {{groupCount}} lietotāju piekļuves līmeni tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERUSER_NON: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi atsauca lietotāja piekļuvi tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICJOIN_ACTIVITYG: Temats {{topicTitle}}: lietotājs {{userName}} un citi atjaunināja kopīgošanas saiti
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICJOIN: Temats {{topicTitle}}: lietotājs {{userName}} atjaunināja dažus kopīgošanas saites parametrus:
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_GROUPJOIN_ACTIVITYG: Grupa {{groupName}}: lietotājs {{userName}} un citi atjaunināja kopīgošanas saiti
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_GROUPJOIN: Grupa {{groupName}}: lietotājs {{userName}} atjaunināja dažus kopīgošanas saites parametrus:
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_JOIN_TOPIC: Lietotājs {{userName}} pievienojās tematam {{topicTitle}} ar piekļuves līmeni: {{accessLevel}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_JOIN_GROUP: Lietotājs {{userName}} pievienojās grupai {{groupName}} ar piekļuves līmeni: {{accessLevel}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_DELETE_TOPICPIN_TOPIC_ACTI: User {{userName}} and {{groupCount}} others have unfavourited topic {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ADD_TOPIC_TOPICPIN_ACTIVIT: User {{userName}} and {{groupCount}} others have favourited topic {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_VOTE_TOPIC_ACTIVITY: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi atjaunināja balsošanas termiņu tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_VOTE_TOPIC_USERACTI: Lietotājs {{userName}} atjaunināja balsošanas termiņu tematam {{topicTitle}} {{groupCount}} reizes
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_CREATE_VOTEDELEGATION_VOTE: Lietotājs {{userName}} deleģēja savu balsi balsojumā par tematu {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_DELETE_VOTEDELEGATION_VOTE: Lietotājs {{userName}} atsauca savas balss deleģējumu balsojumā par tematu {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_VIEW_VOTEUSERCONTAINER: Lietotājs {{userName}} lejupielādēja rezultātus balsojumam par tematu {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_VIEW_VOTEUSERCONTAINER_ACT: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi lejupielādēja balsojuma rezultātus par tematu ({topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_VIEW_VOTEUSERCONTAINER_USE: Lietotājs {{userName}} lejupielādēja rezultātus balsojumam par tematu {{topicTitle}} {{groupCount}} reizes
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_VIEW_VOTEFINALCONTAINER: Lietotājs {{userName}} lejupielādēja rezultātus balsojumam par tematu {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_VIEW_VOTEFINALCONTAINER_AC: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi lejupielādēja balsojuma rezultātus par tematu {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_VIEW_VOTEFINALCONTAINER_US: Lietotājs {{userName}} lejupielādēja rezultātus balsojumam par tematu {{topicTitle}} {{groupCount}} reizes
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_CREATE_COMMENT_TOPIC_ACTIV: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi pievienoja jaunu argumentu tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_COMMENT_TOPIC_ACTIV: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi atjaunināja savus argumentus tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_DELETE_COMMENT_TOPIC_ACTIV: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi dzēsa savus argumentus tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_CREATE_COMMENTVOTE_COMMENT: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi reaģēja {{reaction}} uz argumentu tēmā: {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_COMMENTVOTE_COMMENT: Lietotājs {{userName}} atjaunināja savu reakciju uz argumentu tēmā: {{topicTitle}}
Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi atjaunināja reakcijas uz argumentu tēmā: {{topicTitle}}
Lietotājs {{userName}} atjaunināja {{groupCount}} reakcijas uz argumentu tēmā: {{topicTitle}}
Lietotājs {{userName}} noņēma savu reakciju uz argumentu tēmā: {{topicTitle}}
Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi noņēma reakcijas uz argumentu tēmā: {{topicTitle}}
Lietotājs {{userName}} noņēma {{groupCount}} reakcijas uz argumentu tēmā: {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_CREATE_COMMENT_TOPIC_IN_RE: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi atbildēja uz argumentu tematā {{topicTitle}}
Lietotājs {{userName}} atbildēja {{groupCount}} reizes uz argumentiem tematā {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ADD_TOPIC_GROUP_ACTIVITYGR: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi pievienoja tematus grupai {{groupName}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_DELETE_GROUP_TOPIC_ACTIVIT: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi dzēsa tematus no grupas {{groupName}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERGROUP: Lietotājs {{userName}} mainīja grupas piekļuves līmeni {{groupName}} tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERGROUP_AC: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi lietotāji mainīja grupas piekļuves tiesības {{groupName}} tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERGROUP_US: Lietotājs {{userName}} mainīja grupas piekļuves līmeni {{groupName}} tematiem {{groupCount}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_TOPICMEMBERGROUP_NO: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi atsauca grupas piekļuvi tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_DELETE_TOPICEVENT_TOPIC_AC: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi dzēsta atjauninājumu tematā {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_ADD_ATTACHMENT_TOPIC_ACTIV: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi pievienoja pielikumus tematam {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_DELETE_ATTACHMENT_TOPIC_AC: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi dzēsa pielikumus tematā {{topicTitle}}
ACTIVITY_FEED.ACTIVITY_USER_UPDATE_ATTACHMENT_TOPIC_AC: Lietotājs {{userName}} un {{groupCount}} citi atjaunināja pielikumus tematā {{topicTitle}}

Personal identification code (PID) is already connected to another account. Signing votes with the same PID from different accounts is not allowed.
